Package model.rooms

Class RoomList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.rooms.RoomList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class RoomList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The purpose of this class is to store an arrayList of Room Objects in order to manage them
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
